IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PREPARE ITS STUDENTS FOR COLLEGE AND FOR LIFE AND TO PROVIDE AN ATMOSPHERE IN WHICH ALL MEMBERS OF A DIVERSE SCHOOL COMMUNITY APPRECIATE AND STRIVE FOR EXCELLENCE, AN ATMOSPHERE WHICH NURTURES CHARACTER AND FOSTER THE DEVELOPMENT OF MIND, BODY, AND SPIRIT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PREPARE ITS STUDENTS FOR COLLEGE AND FOR LIFE AND TO PROVIDE AN ATMOSPHERE IN WHICH ALL MEMBERS OF A DIVERSE SCHOOL COMMUNITY APPRECIATE AND STRIVE FOR EXCELLENCE, AN ATMOSPHERE WHICH NURTURES CHARACTER AND FOSTER THE DEVELOPMENT OF MIND, BODY, AND SPIRIT.
IRS990.Desc: ASHEVILLE SCHOOL INCORPORATED IS A COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL FOR STUDENTS IN GRADES NINE THROUGH TWELVE. STUDENTS REPRESENT NINETEEN U.S. STATES AND EIGHTEEN FOREIGN COUNTRIES. TWENTY-SIX PERCENT OF STUDENTS RECEIVE FINANCIAL AID FROM THE SCHOOL. ONE HUNDRED PERCENT OF STUDENTS IN THE CLASS OF 2016 ARE ATTENDING COLLEGE AFTER GRADUATION.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ASST HEAD OF SCHOOL FOR OPERAT

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART IV, LINE 1B
SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED TO SUPPLEMENT INSTRUCTIONAL AND FINANCIAL AID EXPENSES.

THE SCHOOL'S POLICY IS TO EVALUATE ALL TAX POSITIONS AND TO CONSULT WITH EXPERTS TO IDENTIFY THOSE THAT MAY BE CONSIDERED UNCERTAIN. ALL IDENTIFIED MATERIAL TAX POSITIONS WILL BE ASSESSED AND MEASURED BY A REASONABLY POSSIBLE THRESHOLD TO DETERMINE IF THE BENEFIT OF AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION SHOULD BE RECOGNIZED IN THE PERIOD THE CHANGE OCCURS. THE SCHOOL'S FEDERAL RETURNS OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX (FORM 990) FOR 2015, 2014, AND 2013 ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY WERE FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 2D

ADS IN NEWSPAPER AND IN SCHOOL LITERATURE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ASHEVILLE SCHOOL TRACKS DISTRIBUTIONS FROM THE FUNDS THAT ARE SPECIFICALLY RESTRICTED FOR A DESIGNATED PURPOSE AND COMPARES IT TO FUNDS AWARDED TO STUDENTS TO ENSURE THERE ARE NO VIOLATIONS OF DONOR INTENT. A SPREADSHEET IS ALSO KEPT DETAILING EACH STUDENT TO RECEIVE A SCHOLARSHIP, ALONG WITH GRADE AND AMOUNT AWARDED.

TO PREPARE ITS STUDENTS FOR COLLEGE AND FOR LIFE AND TO PROVIDE AN ATMOSPHERE IN WHICH ALL MEMBERS OF A DIVERSE SCHOOL COMMUNITY APPRECIATE AND STRIVE FOR EXCELLENCE, AN ATMOSPHERE WHICH NURTURES CHARACTER AND FOSTER THE DEVELOPMENT OF MIND, BODY, AND SPIRIT.
THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS AND REVIEWED BY THE AUDIT COMMITTEE PRIOR TO FILING.

IN THE EVENT THERE SHOULD ARISE AN ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT BETWEEN THE INTEREST OF THE SCHOOL AND THE INTEREST OF THE TRUSTEE OR MEMBER OF THE ADMINISTRATION, THEN THE TRUSTEE OR MEMBER OF THE ADMINISTRATION INVOLVED MUST DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE OF THE CONFLICT OR POSSIBLE CONFLICT TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND TO THE HEAD OF SCHOOL.

COMPENSATION OF OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES IS DETERMINED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. THE COMPENSATION OF THE HEAD OF THE SCHOOL IS REVIEWED BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE WITH COMPARABILITY DATA BUT WITHOUT SUBSTANTIATION OF DELIBERATION AND DECISION.

THE SCHOOL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC VIA THE OFFICE OF THE ASSISTANT HEAD OF SCHOOL FOR OPERATIONS. A PUBLIC INSPECTION COPY OF FORM 990 IS ALSO AVAILABE AT GUIDESTAR.ORG.
